mil7.5.5:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nakulassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.5:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, nakulo uragamupagacchanto bhesajjena kāyaṃ paribhāvetvā uragamupagacchati gahetuṃ;
mil7.5.5:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kodhāghātabahulaṃ kalahaviggahavivādavirodhābhibhūtaṃ lokamupagacchantena mettābhesajjena mānasaṃ anulimpitabbaṃ.
mil7.5.5:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nakulassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
